item.description:
The Slave-Pit of Drazhu

It doesn't matter how you got here, how long you've been here, or what you
did before you wound up here. All that matters now is that you're a slave
in the mines of the lich Drazhu. You toil in the dark to expand Drazhu's
underground lair, under the watchful eye of a goblin slavemaster and the
lich's orc mercenaries. Life is brutal and short now, and those who are too
weak to serve are killed and thrown into the body pit. There is no hope of
escape.

At least, not until an earthquake suddenly strikes. Now the walls are
cracking, stones are dropping from the ceiling, and your goblin watchdog is
panicing. There's a few mining tools within reach, and it doesn't look like
the orcs in the next section over know what's going on yet.

What do you do?
----
Dungeon World is a fantasy RPG based on the Apocalypse World engine, and
this is a short demo to show off the system. Characters will be provided,
and the game will be self-contained and take around 2 hours. You won't need
any special dice or anything; the standard set will do. Onlookers welcome!

*Players*: 6

*Time:* Wednesday Sept. 12, 6:15 pm. Will run for about 2 and a half hours
item.name: The Slave-Pit of Drazhu
